ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the staff of Kinshasa University Clinics in DR Congo for their support towards the successful implementation of the study. The authors also thank Jane Mqamelo for English editing.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: No funding was received for the study.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: Data will be made available on reasonable request from the corresponding authors.
